title: Chapter 12 - Special Piping and Storage Systems

content.text: 1201.1 Scope: Covers design and installation of nonflammable medical gas systems and nonmedical oxygen systems. Must comply with the Florida Fire Prevention Code for maintenance and operation.
1202.1 Nonflammable medical gases: Systems must meet NFPA 99 standards for installation, testing, and labeling.
Exceptions: (1) Portable systems and cylinder storage are excluded. (2) Vacuum system exhausts must follow the Florida Building Code, Mechanical.
1203.1 Design and installation: Nonmedical oxygen systems must comply with NFPA 55 and NFPA 51.
